select member_identification, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phonenumber, member_gender, member_birthday from tbl_member where member_id = 1
update tbl_member set member_identification=#{memberIdentification}, member_pw=#{memberPw}, member_name=#{memberName}, member_email=#{memberEmail}, member_phonenumber=#{memberPhoneNumber}, member_gender=#{memberGender}, member_birthday=#{memberBirthday} where member_Id = 1
update tbl_member set member_status= 0 where member_id = 1
